sentences.sContent: He was concerned the campaign could ensnare innocent people.
sentences.sCn: 他担心这场运动可能会陷害无辜的人。

synos.tran: 诱捕；诱入陷阱；进入罗网

remMethod.val: en(进入) + snare(罗网， 陷阱) → 诱入陷阱， 进入罗网

trans.tranCn: 诱入陷阱， 进入罗网
trans.tranOther: to trap someone in an unpleasant or illegal situation, from which they cannot escape
